data.comment: The match has started.
Shonan to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
In the minute 1, Throw-in high up the field for Shimizu in Kanagawa.
Can Shimizu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shonan's half?
In Kanagawa, Junior Dutra (Shimizu) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 3, In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Shonan are pushing forward but Keisuke Saka's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Shimizu at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 5, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Free kick Shonan.
Free kick for Shonan in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 9, Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Shonan close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
In the minute 10, Shimizu advance rapidly upfield but Koichiro Fukushima blows for offside.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Shonan throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
In the minute 12, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a throw-in for Shonan, close to Shimizu's area.
Attention is being given to Shonanâ€™s Mitsuki Saito and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 14, Mitsuki Saito is back on his feet again.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Shimizu at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Shonan.
Shonan's Kazunari Ono gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Shimizu defender.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Shimizu.
Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Shonan.
Shonan have a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Shimizu are whistled for offside.
Shonan to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Throw-in Shimizu.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Shonan a goal kick.
In the minute 28, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Shimizu attack but Junior Dutra's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kanagawa.
In the minute 29, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Shonan push upfield but Koichiro Fukushima quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 31, In Kanagawa Shimizu attack through Carlinhos Junior. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
Shonan are coming forward and Naoki Ishihara gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 32, Shimizu have a goal kick.
In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Shimizu pushes forward through Carlinhos Junior, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Shimizu.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Koichiro Fukushima awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kanagawa.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Shonan throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
In the minute 42, Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Shimizu a goal kick.
At Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka, Shimizu are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Koichiro Fukushima has blown to start the second-half.
Goal kick for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 47, Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kanagawa.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Shimizu to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
In Kanagawa, Shimizu push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Goal kick for Shimizu at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 53, In Kanagawa Shonan drive forward through Hirokazu Ishihara. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Carlinhos Junior puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Great play from Yusuke Goto to set up the goal.
In the minute 56, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Shonan.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Shimizu.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Shimizu throw-in in Shonan's half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in Shonan.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 59, Shonan to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Shonan throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
In the minute 60, The home team replace Shota Kobayashi with Kazuaki Mawatari.
Yusuke Goto is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The away team has substituted Yusuke Goto with Yuito Suzuki. Peter Cklamovski is thus making his first change.
In the minute 63, Shonan have a goal kick.
Kenta Nishizawa of Shimizu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 65, Free kick Shonan.
In the minute 66, Shonan have a dangerous throw-in.
Hiroshi Ibusuki is replacing Temma Matsuda for the home team.
The home team have replaced Akimi Barada with Hidetoshi Miyuki. This is the third substitution made today by Bin Ukishima.
Shimizu's Carlinhos Junior is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Peter Cklamovski (Shimizu) is making a second substitution, with Elsinho replacing Shota Kaneko.
In the minute 70, Koichiro Fukushima awards the away team a throw-in.
Shimizu make their third substitution with Yosuke Kawai replacing Keita Nakamura.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Shonan.
Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
In the minute 72, Junior Dutra for Shimizu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Shonan a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
In the minute 74, Play has been interrupted briefly in Kanagawa to check on Renato Augusto, who is grimacing with pain.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Shonan throw-in in Shimizu's half.
In the minute 76, Shimizuâ€™s Renato Augusto is on his feet again at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
The match at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka has been interrupted briefly for a check on Carlinhos Junior, who is down injured.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Shimizu.
Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Carlinhos Junior, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Teerasil Dangda is the substitute for Shimizu.
Free kick Shonan.
In the minute 79, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Shimizu.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Kazuaki Mawatari for Shonan who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Kazuaki Mawatari has recovered and rejoins the match in Kanagawa.
Kenta Nishizawa for Shimizu drives towards goal at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
In the minute 84, Sosuke Shibata (Shonan) has replaced the possibly injured Kazuaki Mawatari.
In the minute 85, Shonan needs to be cautious. Shimizu have an attacking throw-in.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 86, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! Junior Dutra extends Shimizu's lead to 0-2.
Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Shonan in Kanagawa.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Shimizu.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Hiroshi Ibusuki (Shonan) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
Can Shimizu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shonan's half?
Junior Dutra (Shimizu) gets in a great strike â€“ straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
That's full-time at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka. The final score is 0-3.
Kenta Nishizawa puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-3.
